page.title: 14Rotherwas Industrial Estate.
page.content: Today the Rotherwas Estate has become an industrial estate.Rotherwas Industrial Estate lies either side of the B4339 along what is known locally as the, "Straight Mile".The estate has really developed in the last 10 years and it is still being added to. Several firms are represented including Thorn Lighting Company Ltd. D.R.G.Plastics Ltd. Hereford Trailer Company Ltd. Hereford Welding and Engineering Company Ltd. several Transport Companies and many others. Also in this estate is a large Cash and Carry building which sells a wide variety of goods, including food at wholesale prices and many restaurants buy their food at this cash and carry. There is also a factory which makes casks or barrels for the breweries.
